jobOverview: We are looking for a Junior Cyber Security Specialist. The ideal candidate should be familiar with Kali Linux, TCP/ IP protocols, web services, and both android and iOS security. We don’t expect you to know everything but we do expect someone who has basic to mid-level knowledge about cyber security and is willing to learn and grow his career in it.
jobResponsibilities:
• Safeguards information system assets by identifying and solving potential and actual security problems.
  • Perform cyber security services like penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, hack recovery, malware analysis, crime investigation, forensic investigation, source code auditing, incident response etc
  • Protects system by defining access privileges, control structures, and resources.
  • Recognizes problems by identifying abnormalities; reporting violations.
  • Implements security improvements by assessing current situation; evaluating trends; anticipating requirements.
  • Determines security violations and inefficiencies by conducting periodic audits.
  • Upgrades system by implementing and maintaining security controls.
  • Keeps users informed by preparing performance reports; communicating system status.
  • Maintains quality service by following organization standards.
  • Maintains technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing publications.
  • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
  •
jobRequirements:
• Advanced understanding of TCP/IP, common networking ports and protocols, traffic flow, system administration, OSI model, defense-in-depth and common security elements.
    • Hands-on experience analyzing high volumes of logs, network data (e.g. Netflow, FPC), and other attack artifacts in support of incident investigations
    • Experience with vulnerability scanning solutions
    • Familiarity with the DOD Information Assurance Vulnerability Management program.
    • Proficiency with any of the following: Anti-Virus, HIPS, ID/PS, Full Packet Capture, Host-Based Forensics, Network Forensics, and RSA Security
    • In-depth knowledge of architecture, engineering, and operations of at least one enterprise SIEM platform (e.g. Nitro/McAfee Enterprise Security Manager, ArcSight, QRadar, LogLogic, Splunk)
    • Experience developing and deploying signatures (e.g. YARA, Snort, Suricata, HIPS)
    • Understanding of mobile technology and OS (i.e. Android, iOS, Windows), VMware technology, and Unix and basic Unix commands

    Must Have:

    • Superior written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail.
    • Proven ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously, with an eye for prioritization.
    • Must be a tech enthusiast

 

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or Cyber Security or relevant 2 years of work experience.
  • No experience required. Freshers are encourged to apply.

 

Salary: Negotiable

jobOverview: We are looking for sales executives who has native alike English fluency, knows how to negotiate and pursue clients from abroad.

jobOverview: We are looking for a FrontEnd developer who is proficient with Next.js and React.js. Your primary focus will be on developing user interface components and implementing them. You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem-solving, sophisticated design, and quality products is important.
jobResponsibilities:
• Developing new user-facing features using Next.js and React.js.
    • Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
    • Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
    • Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
    • Perform testing and optimization for improved performance and user experience.
    • Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency.
    • Conduct thorough testing to identify and address bugs, usability, and performance issues.
    • Stay informed about the latest trends and advancements in frontend development.
    • Willingness to adapt to new technologies and methodologies as needed.
jobRequirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in CSE
  • For the people who have at least 1 year of experience in React.js & Next.js
  • Freshers are also encouraged to apply.

 

 

  • Experience Requirements:
    • Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
    • Thorough understanding of React.js/Next.js and its core principles
    • Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
    • Experienced in handling server side actions using Next js.
    • Experience with state management libraries, such as Redux or Context API.
    • Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
    • Experience with ajax, axios, fetch etc.
    • Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
    • Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
    • Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
    • Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial
    • Familiarity with version control systems (particularly Git) and Project Management Tools (Like Trello, Asana etc.)
    • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
    • Analytical mindset and ability to troubleshoot and solve complex frontend issues.

 

  • Salary- Negotiable

jobOverview: We are seeking a talented and experienced Human Resources Specialist to join our team and contribute to our ongoing success. If you are a motivated HR professional with a passion for fostering a positive workplace culture and driving employee engagement, we want to hear from you.
jobResponsibilities:
1. Talent Acquisition:

    • Manage the full recruitment life cycle, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding for various positions within the company.
    • Collaborate with department heads to understand staffing needs and develop effective recruitment strategies.
    • Conduct job fairs, campus recruitment, and other talent acquisition events.

  2. Employee Relations:

    • Act as a point of contact for employee relations, addressing concerns, and fostering a positive work environment.
    • Mediate and resolve workplace conflicts, ensuring fair and consistent application of company policies.
    • Conduct exit interviews to gather feedback and identify areas for improvement.

  3. Performance Management:

    • Implement and oversee performance management processes, including goal-setting, performance evaluations, and development plans.
    • Provide guidance to managers on employee development and performance improvement strategies.

  4. Benefits Administration:

    • Administer employee benefits programs, including health insurance, retirement plans, and other perks.
    • Assist employees with benefits-related inquiries and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

  5. HR Policies and Compliance:

    • Develop and update HR policies and procedures in accordance with legal requirements and industry best practices.
    • Stay informed about changes in employment laws and regulations to ensure company compliance.

  6. Training and Development:

    • Coordinate training programs to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
    • Identify training needs and collaborate with department managers to address skill gaps.
jobRequirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • Minimum 1 year of proven experience in human resources roles.
  • Strong knowledge of HR best practices, employment laws, and regulations.
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
  • Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.
  • Proficient in HRIS (Human Resources Information System) and Microsoft Office Suite.

Salary: Negotiable

Office Location: House#149, Lane#01, 4th Floor, Baridhara DOHS, Dhaka

jobOverview: We are looking for a qualified Customer Support Executive to manage a team of representatives who will offer excellent customer service and after-sales support. You will create policies and procedures and oversee the customer service provided by the team. The Customer Support Executive will be responsible for the selection of staff in the hiring process and ensure that a standardized level of service is maintained for all customers.

What You will be doing
·         conducting customer satisfaction surveys to understand what areas of the company's services need improvements

·         catering to customer phone calls and diverting the call to the relevant department for a more advanced form of query resolution

·         curating streamlined email and social media communication mediums for offers, updates and much more

·         dealing with customer issues and churning out an easy-to-follow solution

·         managing payment and delivery of customer orders

·         helping customers choose the right product for their requirements and budget

·         handling customer concerns and complaints in a timely manner

·         informing customers of upcoming promotions or deals

·         establishing a positive rapport with all clients and customers in person or via phone

·         forming reports based on customer satisfaction statistics and helping their team to develop new skills

·         fixing appointments based on the availability of customers and clients

·         interacting with customers to ensure they have a desirable and shareable experience

  • A minimum of 1 year experience.

  • Freshers are also encouraged to apply.

  • Excellent interpersonal and written and oral communication skills.

  • Ability to lead a team.

  • Knowledge of CRM systems.

  • Computer skills.

  • Knowledge of mediation and conflict resolution techniques is preferable.

jobOverview: Project managers are responsible for planning and overseeing projects to ensure they are completed in a timely fashion and within budget. Project managers plan and designate project resources, prepare budgets, monitor progress, and keep stakeholders informed the entire way. This is all done within the confines of a company's goals and vision.
jobResponsibilities:
•  Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget

  • Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant internal stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility

  • Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress

  • Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate verification techniques

  • Measure performance using appropriate project management tools and techniques

  • Report and escalate to management as needed

  • Manage the relationship with the client and relevant stakeholders

  • Perform risk management to minimize potential risk

  • Delegate project tasks based on junior staff members' individual strengths, skill sets, and experience levels

  • Track project performance, specifically to analyze the successful completion of short and long-term goals

  • Develop comprehensive project plans to be shared with clients as well as other staff members

  • Attend conferences and training as required to maintain proficiency
jobRequirements:
• Proven working experience in project management

  • Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills

  • Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills

  • Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office

  • Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a plus

  • Bachelor's Degree in appropriate field of study or equivalent work experience

  • Experience with project management software tools

jobOverview: We are looking for a Quality Assurance (Sales & Marketing) professional who will be responsible for ensuring that the sales and marketing processes are in compliance with the company's quality standards and regulations. They work closely with sales and marketing teams to identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions to prevent quality issues.
jobResponsibilities:
1. Develop and implement quality control procedures for sales and marketing processes, including product development, advertising, and customer service.

  2. Conduct regular audits of sales and marketing processes to ensure compliance with quality standards and regulations.

  3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas for improvement in the sales and marketing process, including product design, marketing messaging, and customer feedback.

  4. Develop and maintain metrics to measure the effectiveness of sales and marketing quality control procedures.

  5. Train sales and marketing teams on quality control procedures and best practices.

  6. Investigate and resolve customer complaints related to sales and marketing activities.

  7. Ensure that all sales and marketing activities comply with applicable laws and regulations, such as the Federal Trade Commission Act, the CAN-SPAM Act, and the Consumer Protection Act.
jobRequirements:
1. Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field.

  2. 2 years of experience in a quality assurance or quality control role, preferably in a sales and marketing environment is preferable. 

  3. Knowledge of quality control procedures and best practices.

  4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

  5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

  6. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

  7. Familiarity with applicable laws and regulations related to sales and marketing activities.

  8. Experience with data analysis and reporting tools, such as Microsoft Excel and Google Analytics.

  9. Good to have an IELTS certificate.

jobOverview: The right candidate will be an enthusiastic, self-starter that’s not afraid of being a part of an industry/business that is driven by innovation, and therefore, constantly evolving. The ideal candidate will drive a full-cycle sales process for our HRMS software and services through prospecting, building relationships with key decision-makers, presenting the value of our solutions, negotiating contracts, and closing opportunities.
jobResponsibilities:
• Initiate communication to prospective clients through visiting Corporate offices.

  • Assess client needs and promote suitable products

  • Meet with decision-makers and provide information about software products

  • Perform product demonstrations and training as needed

  • Negotiate sales prices

  • Construct pitches and sales presentations

  • Follow-up on all leads supplied and ensure internal systems are updated
jobRequirements:
Skills:

 

  • Customer Focus: Act in ways that demonstrate customer focus and satisfaction by building effective relationships with customers, identifying, meeting and exceeding customer expectations, and by treating customers with dignity and respect

  • Partner Focus: Act in ways that demonstrate partner focus and satisfaction by building effective relationships with partners, identifying, meeting and exceeding partner expectations, and by treating partners with dignity and respect

  • Effective Communication: Deliver oral and written communications that are impactful and persuasive with their intended audience

  • Industry Knowledge: In-depth knowledge of the IT industry and relevant marketplace; can speak with authority, e.g., on industry trends, best practices, competitive practices, regulatory issues, etc.

  • Effective Selling: Utilise solutions-oriented, systematic approach to selling, leverage mastery of sales best practices and ABC Company’s sales methodology

  • Business Acumen: Understand key aspects of business, e.g., business models and competitive positioning; also understand how business operates, including role of structure, systems, and processes; can speak in business language when applying professional expertise

  • Financial Acumen: Use financial analysis to make decisions, evaluate opportunities and choices; know how financial decisions impact business success

 

Educational Qualifications:

 

  • Master's / Bachelor's degree in Marketing and or any other discipline from any recognized university.

  • At least 1-2 years of IT and Telecommunications industry sales experience.

 

Additional Qualifications:

 

  • Age 25 to 40 years

  • Only males are allowed to apply

  • Minimum 1-3 years' experience in related field

  • The applicants should have experience in the following area(s): Corporate Sales, Sales & Marketing

  • Excellent sales and negotiation skills

  • Good business sense

  • Initiative and enthusiasm

  • Should have good negotiation, communication, interpersonal & organisational skills.

 

 

Must be Sincere, Dedicated, Target Oriented, Diligent, Committed & Time bound

jobOverview: This is a full-time on-site role for a Corporate Sales Manager. The Corporate Sales Manager will be responsible for managing key accounts, generating leads, driving sales, providing exceptional customer service, and overseeing sales operations. The Corporate Sales Manager will work closely with cross-functional teams to achieve company revenue targets and business objectives.
jobResponsibilities:
• Builds business by identifying and selling prospects; maintaining relationships with clients.

  • Identifies business opportunities by identifying prospects and evaluating their position in the industry; researching and analysing sales options.

  • Sells products/services by establishing contact and developing relationships with prospects; recommending solutions.

  • Analyses the existing markets, gathers more info/data, identifies the market’s weakness and develops new strong strategies to boost up the sales. 

  • Time to time report generation, audit on existing teams & operations to identify the aspects where improvements are required.

  • Maintains relationships with clients by providing support, information, and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements.

  • Identifies product/service improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.

  • Prepares reports by collecting, analysing, and summarising information.

  • Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organisation standards.

  • Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; benchmarking state-of-the-art practices; and participating in professional societies.

  • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
jobRequirements:
Qualifications / Skills:

  • Presentation Skills

  • Client Relationships

  • Emphasising Excellence

  • Energy Level

  • Negotiation Skills

  • Prospecting Skills

  • Meeting Sales Goals

  • Creativity

  • Sales Planning

  • Independence

  • Motivation for Sales

 

Education, Experience, and Licensing Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s or master’s degree with a concentration in Corporate marketing, promotions, advertising sales and B2B Sales preferred

  • At least 5 years of IT and Telecommunications industry sales experience

  • Strategic leadership ability

jobOverview: We're looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to join our growing team. You should be well versed in Google Ads, Funnel Marketing, Linkedin/ Facebook/ Twitter Marketing, SEO, Email marketing and has deep understanding in data analytics.
jobResponsibilities:
• Develops digital marketing strategy by studying economic indicators, tracking changes in supply and demand, identifying customers and their current and future needs, and monitoring the competition.

  • Plans and executes all web, SEO/SEM, database marketing, email, social media, and display advertising campaigns.

  • Measures and reports performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assesses against goals.

  • Brainstorms new and creative growth strategies through digital marketing.

  • Collaborates with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience.

  • Utilizes strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.

  • Identifies critical conversion points and drop off points and optimizes user funnels.

  • Completes digital marketing operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees and following up on work results. Maintains training employees.
jobRequirements:
• Proven working experience in digital marketing, particularly within the industry or DSP networks or Digital media buying agencies.

  • Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns.

  • Working knowledge of preparing Content Strategies for effective digital returns.

  • Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels & working knowledge of ad serving tools.

  • Solid knowledge of website and marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends, SEMRush, etc.)

 

Qualifications:

  • Minimum Graduate & 3 (Three) years of experience working in Digital Marketing.

  • Digital Marketing Course Completed and Certified.

  • Strong communication skills, fluency in written and spoken English.

 

Office Location: House#149, Lane#01, 4th Floor, Baridhara DOHS, Dhaka-1206.

 

Salary: The annual salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience. Excellent benefits offered.

jobOverview: TechForing is looking for a full-time Jr. Accountant located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. This role requires a detail-oriented individual to perform daily accounting tasks and assist in the preparation of financial documents. The  Accountant is responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, conducting audits, and assisting with budgeting.
jobResponsibilities:
Key Responsibilities: 
• Assist in maintaining financial records, preparing financial statements, reconciling accounts, and processing invoices. Support senior accountants with month-end and year-end close processes. Perform basic bookkeeping tasks and ensure compliance with financial regulations.
• Manage accounts payable processes, including invoice processing, expense reports, and vendor communication. Reconcile accounts, and resolve.
• Assist with maintaining the general ledger, journal entries, and account reconciliations. Support in the preparation of financial statements, budgeting, and variance analysis. Help with internal and external audit processes. 
• Assist with tax compliance, including the preparation of income tax returns, sales tax reports, and payroll tax filings. Research tax regulations and ensure accurate and timely submissions. Support the tax planning and advisory efforts of the finance team.
jobRequirements:
Qualifications:

• Minimum BBA Graduate from a reputed university, major in Accounting/ Finance & 1 year of experience working in Accounts Finance background job.

• Strong communication skills, and fluency in written and spoken English.

 

Benefit:

·         • Free or subsidized meals, snacks, or coffee in the workplace.

·         • Weekly, monthly and quarterly performance-based bonuses.

·         • Training programs and workshops to enhance skills.

·         •  Provident fund facility.

Salary: Negotiable

Office Location: House#149, Lane#01, 4th Floor, Baridhara DOHS, Dhaka-1206.

jobOverview: We are looking for a Senior Software Programmer who has knowledge, passion, and experience in designing and developing web applications. You will be responsible for developing backend code that efficiently interfaces with frontend code to transact data. You will need to collaborate with the front-end developer and designing team for the best output. So, being a team player is a must.
jobResponsibilities:
• Work with stakeholders and fellow developers
  • Design and implement Python code by using Django framework
  • Identify and fix bottlenecks that may arise from inefficient code
  • Identify and fix bugs
  • Create a wide variety of unit tests to verify the functionality of softwares
  • Manage the security of platform
  • Write detailed documentation around the code
  • Collaborate with the front-end and designing team for best output.
jobRequirements:
• The ability to think critically and problem solving capability
  • High level of knowledge in Python and Django framework
  • Familiarity with event-driven programming and MVC
  • Good understanding of SQL database
  • Expertise in REST APIs
  • Good understanding of React framework to collaborate with front-end team
  • Educational Requirements: B.Sc in CSE/IT.

  • Experience: 1 year of professional experience as Django Developer in a reputed organization. Freshers with passion and sound knowledge of Python (Django Framework) are encouraged to apply.

    Salary: Negotiable

    Job Location: Baridhara DOHS, Dhaka.

jobOverview:
•  
  • Ensure accuracy when assisting with the coordination, issuance, and handling of visas.
  • Advise and guide applicants through the visa application process.
  • Keep up to date with current visa rules and regulations.
  • Organize and manage documents and other paperwork in an organized manner.
  • Provide excellent customer service to clients.
jobResponsibilities:
Visa Counselor Responsibilities Include

  • Providing counsel and information regarding visa application process to the applicants.
  • Understanding the requirements of the different visa categories.
  • Organizing and managing relevant documents and paperwork.
  • Answering any queries and providing support for visa-related matters.

jobOverview: Are you a wizard with visuals? Do you possess a keen eye for detail and an innate ability to turn ideas into captivating graphics and videos? Join our Social Media Marketing Team and be the driving force behind our brand's visual storytelling!
jobResponsibilities:
•    Create High-quality motion graphics and videos for various purposes, including marketing, social media, product promotion, corporate communications, and shorts/reels video etc

•    Conceptualize and create engaging graphics and videos for social media platforms to enhance brand awareness and engagement.

•    Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative strategies and concepts for social media campaigns.

•    Edit and enhance existing multimedia content to align with brand guidelines and campaign objectives.

•    Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continuously improve the quality and effectiveness of visual content.

•    Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards.

•    Coordinate with internal stakeholders and external vendors to ensure seamless execution of creative projects.
jobRequirements:
•    Proven experience as a creative graphics and video content creator/editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.

•    Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, After Effects, InDesign, Lightroom) and other relevant software.

•    Solid understanding of social media platforms and their visual requirements.

•    Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within a team.

•    Ability to think creatively and translate ideas into compelling visual stories.

•    Strong attention to detail and a passion for continuous learning and self-improvement.

jobOverview: A corporate lawyer in Bangladesh provides legal advice on business transactions, mergers, acquisitions, and corporate governance, ensuring compliance with local and international laws. They draft and negotiate contracts, manage litigation, and mitigate legal risks. Employed in law firms, corporations, or government agencies, they collaborate with various departments to support business operations. Strong negotiation, analytical, and communication skills are essential, with career progression leading to senior legal roles. The role demands navigating complex regulations and managing high-pressure situations.
jobResponsibilities:
• Legal Advisory:

    • Provide legal advice to corporations on a variety of issues including business transactions, acquisitions, mergers, and legal rights.
    • Ensure that the company operates within the law at all times, offering counsel on legal implications of business decisions.

  • Contract Management:

    • Draft, review, and negotiate contracts and other legal documents to ensure the company’s interests are protected.
    • Oversee compliance with the terms and conditions of contracts.

  • Corporate Governance:

    • Advise on corporate governance practices and compliance.
    • Assist in the preparation and filing of necessary documents with regulatory authorities.

  • Mergers and Acquisitions:

    • Facilitate mergers, acquisitions, and other corporate restructuring processes.
    • Conduct due diligence to assess potential legal risks and liabilities.

  • Compliance and Regulatory Issues:

    • Ensure the corporation complies with all applicable laws and regulations, including those specific to Bangladesh.
    • Handle matters related to corporate compliance programs and policies.

  • Dispute Resolution and Litigation:

    • Represent the corporation in legal proceedings and disputes.
    • Manage and resolve conflicts, negotiate settlements, and liaise with external legal counsel when necessary.

  • Risk Management:

    • Identify and mitigate potential legal risks facing the corporation.
    • Develop and implement risk management strategies.
jobRequirements:
• Educational Background:

    • A law degree (LLB) from a recognized public or private university.
    • Further qualifications such as an LLM or professional certifications can be advantageous.

  • Professional Experience:

    • Minimum 3 years of prior experience in corporate law, labor law preferably within a corporate environment or a law firm specializing in corporate legal matters.
    • Experience with mergers and acquisitions, corporate compliance, and commercial litigation.

  • Key Skills:

    • Strong understanding of corporate law, labor law and regulations in Bangladesh.
    • Excellent negotiation, drafting, and communication skills.
    • Analytical skills and attention to detail.
    • Ability to handle multiple tasks and work under pressure.

jobOverview: As the Chief Technical Officer for a cybersecurity solution company in Bangladesh, your perspective would be grounded in the urgent need to fortify the nation's digital infrastructure against evolving cyber threats while capitalizing on the growing demand for robust security solutions. You'd lead the development and deployment of innovative cybersecurity technologies and strategies tailored to the specific challenges faced by businesses, government agencies, and individuals in Bangladesh. Collaborating closely with stakeholders across sectors, including regulatory bodies and industry associations, you'd advocate for heightened awareness, education, and investment in cybersecurity to mitigate risks and foster trust in the digital ecosystem. Your strategic vision would not only position the company as a trusted partner in safeguarding Bangladesh's digital assets but also contribute to the country's broader efforts in building cyber resilience and driving sustainable growth.
jobResponsibilities:
1. Technology Strategy Development: Formulate and execute a comprehensive technology strategy aligned with the company's objectives and the country's socio-economic landscape.

  2. Innovation Leadership: Lead the identification, evaluation, and implementation of emerging technologies that can drive competitive advantage and address market needs.

  3. Team Leadership and Talent Development: Build and mentor a high-performing technical team, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.

  4. Product Development and Management: Oversee the development, deployment, and enhancement of technology products and solutions, ensuring alignment with customer requirements and market trends.

  5. Partnership and Stakeholder Engagement: Cultivate strategic partnerships with government agencies, industry associations, educational institutions, and technology providers to foster innovation and drive business growth.

  6. Regulatory Compliance and Risk Management: Stay abreast of regulatory requirements and industry standards, ensuring the company's technology practices adhere to legal and ethical guidelines while effectively managing cybersecurity risks.

  7. Infrastructure and Operations Management: Optimize IT infrastructure and operational processes to enhance efficiency, reliability, and scalability, leveraging cloud technologies and automation where appropriate.

  8. Budgeting and Resource Allocation: Develop and manage technology budgets, allocating resources effectively to support business objectives while maintaining cost-effectiveness.
jobRequirements:
• Technical Expertise: Strong technical acumen across a broad range of domains, including software development, cybersecurity, cloud computing, data analytics, and emerging technologies.

  • Leadership Skills: Proven track record of leadership in driving technology innovation and managing technical teams, with excellent communication, collaboration, and decision-making abilities.

  • Business Acumen: Deep understanding of business processes, market dynamics, and customer needs, with the ability to translate technical capabilities into business value.

  • Strategic Thinking: Ability to envision and execute long-term technology strategies aligned with organizational goals and industry trends, while also demonstrating agility and adaptability in response to changing circumstances.

  • Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with the socio-economic and regulatory landscape of Bangladesh, including key sectors such as finance, healthcare, agriculture, and telecommunications.

  • Education : A bachelor's or master's degree from a reputed public or private university in computer science, engineering, or IT.

  • Certifications: Relevant certifications in areas such as project management, cybersecurity, and cloud computing can be advantageous, demonstrating ongoing professional development and expertise.

  • Experience: Minimum 5 years of experience is required.

jobOverview: We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer to join our creative and fast-paced development team.  As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality web applications using Next.js and React.js. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of frontend development principles and a proven track record of delivering clean, efficient, reusable, maintainable  and user-friendly code.
jobResponsibilities:
• Design and develop responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using React.js, Next js, MUI, Tailwind Css , Chart js, React Pdf and React Hook Form. 

  • Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement design concepts into functional and intuitive user experiences.

  • Implement reusable and modular components following best practices for a scalable and maintainable codebase.

  • Implement data fetching and synchronization with backend APIs.

  • Ensure compatibility and consistent rendering across various browsers.

  • Perform testing and optimization for improved performance and user experience.

  • Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency.

  • Conduct thorough testing to identify and address bugs, usability, and performance issues.

  • Stay informed about the latest trends and advancements in frontend development.

  • Willingness to adapt to new technologies and methodologies as needed.
jobRequirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.

  • Proven experience (Preferably 2 years) as a Frontend Developer, with a focus on React.js 

  • Proficient in React.js and its core principles.

  • Experienced in handling server side actions using Next js. 

  • Experience with state management libraries, such as Redux or  Context API.

  • Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript. Having experience in Typescript is a plus.

  • Experience in building responsive web applications that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes.
